metadata.title: CVE-2017-18189 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the startread function in xa.c in Sound eXchange (SoX) through 14.4.2, acorrupt header specifying zero channels triggers an infinite loop with aresultant NULL pointer dereference, which may allow a remote attacker tocause a denial-of-service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18189` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsox-fmt-all - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-alsa - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-ao - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-base - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-mp3 - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-oss - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-pulse - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox2 - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
sox - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1').
